tip: You can change the frequency of tips by adding a json object instead of a string, like so. For example, this tip has a frequency of 0 and will never show up. The default freq value is 1.

Ruin size, largest to smallest: Vast > Extensive > Widespread > Scattered
Highly armored ships, especially those equipped with ablative armor, can sometimes simply shrug off what would otherwise be lethal damage.
Piracy can be a lucrative affair.
Lots of credits makes a spacer change.
Who would weep for a spacer?
I thought I had friends, but in the end, a spacer dies lonely.
Shit's certain death for us pirate bastards.
Bury me smiling with my credits in my pocket.
Make mistakes but learn from every one.
